Title: Requires private investigators to notify the state police when they are employed by a foreign government or foreign national and requires the state police to maintain a registry of certain private investigators
Summary: Requires private investigators to notify the state police when they are employed by a foreign government or foreign national; requires the state police to maintain a registry of all private investigators who have been employed by a foreign government or foreign national.
LawCode: Amd ยง70, add ยง88-a, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring private investigators to notify the state police when they are employed by a foreign government or foreign national and requiring the state police to maintain a registry of all private investigators who have been employed by a foreign government or foreign national
